tool_description: Get the win-propensity score for a B2B sales opportunity
title: B2B Sales Forecasting

api_list.name: Win-propensity score for a single opportunity, described by qualitative sales attributes
api_list.description: Win-propensity score for a single opportunity, described by qualitative sales attributes. Description is passed to API with Body, please see example below. To get list of allow values please query API /model{model_id} first.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://b2b-sales-forecasting.p.rapidapi.com/score/{model_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "b2b-sales-forecasting.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Description of Machine Learning Model parameters
api_list.description: API returns a general description of ML model, like Classification Accuracy, list of allowed qualitative sales attributes and their values. Only those values are allowed when describing opportunity.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://b2b-sales-forecasting.p.rapidapi.com/model/{model_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "b2b-sales-forecasting.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://b2b-sales-forecasting.p.rapidapi.com/score/{model_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "b2b-sales-forecasting.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
